featured.text: If you want to borrow magazines, tapes, or CDs, you can visit the library.

other.text: On a tape-recorder in another room. (D) In a studio. 53.

definition.zh_def: 一種長條狀的材料，通常用於粘合物品或包裝。
definition.en_def: A long strip of material, typically used for sticking objects together or for packaging.
definition.example: I need some tape to wrap this gift.
